sentences.en: Always could calm me down at fidgety night I can't image it.
sentences.cn: 经常让我在难以忍受的,坐立不安的夜里平静.

sentences.en: And by - and - by nervous and fidgety.
sentences.cn: 他们的神经越来越紧张,烦躁不安.

sentences.en: He felt fidgety and immersed his head in the cold water.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很烦躁,把头伸进了冷水中.

sentences.en: Is it caused by physical tiredness, mental exhaustion or fidgety resulting from stress?
sentences.cn: 是身体劳累, 心理疲惫还是因紧张而烦躁?

sentences.en: It made Lily so fidgety and she asked such impossible questions.
sentences.cn: 这弄得莉丽心烦意乱,她提出了一些使人难堪的责问.

sentences.en: Objective To deepen the cognition to the experiences of controlled fidgety patients.
sentences.cn: 目的加深对烦躁患者约束体验的认识.

sentences.en: See what all with a revolting feeling , fidgety, become angry frequently.
sentences.cn: 看什么都不顺眼, 烦躁, 动辄发火.

sentences.en: That fidgety girl keeps twisting her fingers and shaking her feet.
sentences.cn: 那个坐立不安的女孩不断地扭著指头晃动著脚.

sentences.en: The boys get fidgety if they can’t play outside.
sentences.cn: 要是不能出去玩，这些男孩子就会坐立不安。

sentences.en: The children get fidgety if they have nothing to do.
sentences.cn: 小孩子要是没事可做,就会变得不耐烦起来.

sentences.en: The young mother does not know how to get along with her fidgety son.
sentences.cn: 年轻的母亲不知道怎样和她那烦躁不安的儿子相处.

sentences.en: Wang Ho - fu , however, was fidgety.
sentences.cn: 王和甫 却有点坐立不安.

sentences.en: We are not either fidgety or quarrelsome now.
sentences.cn: 我们现在既不好寻事,也不爱争吵.

sentences.en: Work to usually regret , irascibility, fidgety and pessimism, and is hard to control own motion.
sentences.cn: 做事经常后悔、易怒 、 烦躁、悲观, 难以控制自己的情绪.

words.tran_cn: 烦躁；坐立不安；烦躁不安的人
不安的，烦躁的；难以取悦的

trans.tran_cn: 坐立不安的，不安定的，为琐事操心的
trans.tran_en: unable to stay still, especially because of being bored or nervous
